article.title: Selling AI Without the Hype: A Playbook for Turning Interest Into Partnerships

relatedProjects.name: Since AI
relatedProjects.tagline: Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform and hackathon
relatedProjects.description: Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform and hackathon
relatedProjects.longDescription: Since AI is an innovative AI hackathon and innovation platform positioning itself as Northern Europe's premier destination for AI advancement. Through strategic partnerships with global technology leaders and cutting-edge program design, Since AI drives community engagement and practical AI innovation across the Nordic region.
highlights: Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform
Strategic partnerships with global technology leaders

relatedProjects.name: Attractor
relatedProjects.tagline: Technology consultancy building production-grade software and AI systems
relatedProjects.description: Technology consultancy building production-grade software and AI systems
relatedProjects.longDescription: Attractor is a technology consultancy building production-grade software, applied AI, and security-first systems. Operating at the intersection of commercial execution and technical delivery, helping teams turn unclear goals into shipped outcomes through practical AI integration and solution architecture.
